name: Car Information Retrieve Belgium
short_description:
This software package implements a proof-of-concept website
that supplies information about car license numbers.
Three parties are involved:
(1) an end user with a browser, (2) this website,
and (3) the DIV database server site (Belgium).
 
The end user prepares a text file with car license numbers
plus additional information.
Via his/her browser the end user contacts this website
(i.e. the website implemented by this software package)
and uploads the text file.
 
This website then takes the role of a client to interrogate
the DIV server about the license numbers in the uploaded file.
The result of this query is stored in an output text file
on the same computer as where this website is hosted.
summary: This client software will retrieve information of car owners in Belgiu
